Title: Relates to allowing certain entities to accept and secure deposits from municipal corporations
Summary: Relates to allowing credit unions, savings banks, savings and loan associations, national banks, federal savings associations, federal credit unions, and out-of-state banks to accept and secure deposits from municipal corporations.
LawCode: Amd §10, Gen Muni L; amd §§454, 237, 234 & 383, Bank L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general municipal law and the banking law, in relation to allowing certain entities to accept and secure deposits from municipal corporations
